author: amassari
msg: Fix for jira#1181 (Relative URL resolving broken): the given base URI was used to test the final URI, but the current entity was then used to open the resource

author: neilg
msg: If the namespace of an element is the same as that of the
grammar we're using, we don't switch grammars.  Therefore,
under these conditions we should not switch back--if we do, the GrammarResolver
may present us with a different grammar, and this produces very bad results.

author: peiyongz
msg: Memory Leakage Fixed , patch from David Bertoni
